text: Judy Pancoast is an American singer and songwriter of children's music. == Life == She is from Maine and went to college and preformed for children. She was inspired by The Carpenters She created a song with Kasey Lansdale. She released "Swimming in Jello" in 2003. In 2011 she was nominated for a Grammy Awards for Best Children's Album. == Music == ;Albums * Swimming in Jello (2003) * The Tune Room (2005) * Are We There Yet (2005) * Weird Things Are Everywhere! (2011) == Other websites == * Official website == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Maine Category:American singer-songwriters
title: Judy Pancoast
